item.title: Cisco's Unified Computing Cuts Costs and Power
item.description:
Cisco’s Unified Computing technology aims to make data centers more efficient. Recognizing the enduring role of virtualization, Cisco fully embraces it to enhance performance and cut expenses, leading to reduced power usage. You might be reminded of Unified Communications (UC) when hearing about Unified Computing. UC aims to combine all forms of business communication, such as phones, emails, faxes, voicemails, and instant messaging, into a single infrastructure. A good example is Kall8’s feature that sends faxes and voicemails to your email...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/ciscos-unified-computing-cuts-costs-and-power/
